item.description: BMES Boston Local Industry Chapter and ASME Event When: Wednesday, September 14th, 2011, 6:00 PM - 9:00 PM Where: MIT, Building 3, Room 270, 77 Massachusetts Ave, Cambridge, MA Register: http://www.bmes.org/aws/BMES/pt/sd/calendar/17455/_PARENT/layout_details/false The Biomedical Engineering Society (BMES) Boston Industry Chapter and the American Society of Mechanical Engineers (ASME) Boston would like to invite you to a “New Biomedical Ventures: Engineering in the Context of Uncertainty” event hosted by Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) on Wednesday, September 14th, 6:00 – 9:00 PM at MIT, Building 3, Room 270, 77 Massachusetts Ave, Cambridge, MA. There will be a forty minute long networking event with a light meal leading into our panel discussion about new Biomedical Ventures with additional networking afterwards. Please register in advance online. If you have any questions please contact Stephen Pittman ( bmesprofessional@gmail.com).
item.name: BMES Boston Local Industry Chapter and ASME Event
